group_1.textLeft: Ugh... It's far too fast to keep up with!
I think...I might be the only one who can @stop it.
Here I go! Accelerator!
She leapt into the air?!

group_1.textRight: She's insanely fast!

group_1.textLeft: She stopped its movements! Now, Iroha!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:4001_equip_arms_bow_vh]Okay! Strada Futuro!

group_1.textCenter: It's still standing?! Time for us to get@going, too!

group_1.textLeft: I'll finish it like BAM!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Rena! Kaede! NOW!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Here goes nothing!

group_1.textCenter: I don't have the time to play with these @things all day!

group_1.textRight: Time for me to end this! I'm going to use@my most powerful magic!

group_1.textLeft: Wha... What the heck is she gonna do?!

group_1.textRight: Diabolic Emission!
Wh-what?!
If we got caught in that blast, we'd all@be dead!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you can't use that one on people...
Bardiche, we need to do something too.

group_1.textRight: What's that gigantic sword for?!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:4033A01]Thunderlight Flash! Plasma Zanber!

group_1.textRight: Now for the grand finale! Formula Drive!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa...

group_1.textRight: Not even a speck left...

group_1.narration: We at the TSAB thank you for your@assistance. Good job, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: And now, I can formally announce that the@first Mirrors Cup goes to...
Both Team Nanoha and Team Momoko, in an@unprecedented double victory!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300200:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Congratulations!
*Sniff* *Sob*
...I'm so relieved that we don't have to@split up!

group_1.textCenter: Wish we could have at least finished the@final, though.

group_1.textLeft: Same here... How disappointing.

group_1.textRight: Sorry guys, but if we don't hurry back soon@the tunnel's going to close!

group_1.textLeft: We thought our futures were riding on@the results of this tournament...
So we gave it all we had...
But it looks like we were mistaken.

group_1.textRight: Now that I know that I'm kind of bummed...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* But it was still a good experience.
We were able to become friends with Momoko@and the others.
Plus I think our teamwork is stronger than@ever!
Well, it's about time for us to say goodbye!

group_1.textRight: Come again whenever ya want!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! We'll have our rematch then!

group_1.textRight: I'll text you!

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, please do!

group_1.textRight: Have a safe trip back!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, what a day!

group_1.textRight: I'm completely wiped.

group_1.textLeft: Heh, same here.

group_1.textRight: Huh? That's weird...

group_1.textLeft: What's up, Kaede?

group_1.textRight: None of my texts are going through...
Back when they were all here in Mirrors...
I sent Hayate a text, and she replied to@it too...

group_1.textLeft: You're right!
I can't get through to Nanoha, Fate, or@Hayate. It works for everyone else...
Wonder if somethin' happened?
Perhaps it's because the tunnel they're@taking back home has closed...

group_1.textRight: Huh? But the texts are still going to@Japan, right?
Well... I just checked on my phone, and...
There's no Uminari City anywhere, and no@school with the name Seisho...

group_1.textLeft: They didn't seem like they were lyin' about@that. And the texts went through before...
Actually, this IS strange. They live in@Japan, so they could've taken a train home.
Why did they need to go through a space@tunnel to get back?

group_1.textRight: It was late, maybe there weren't any trains@at that hour?

group_1.textLeft: That woman they worked for...
The one who called my copy a "fugitive who@opened a rift between worlds".
I don't think she would've phrased it like@that if they'd only traveled in Japan.

group_1.textRight: So you're saying...they came here from@a different world?

group_1.textLeft: There's even a chance they didn't even@realize it...

group_1.textRight: No way! Does that mean we won't ever see@them again?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, it could just be the internet actin'@up, but...

group_1.textRight: No, it's for the better.
No matter where those girls are now...
We still met them and became friends,@that's a fact.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're right!
We'd better start workin' now so that the@next time we see those three...
...we'll be an even better team than before!
